title: The Reincarnated Vampire Wants an Afternoon Nap - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Harem   Psychological   Shoujo Ai   Slice of Life   Yuri
tags: Adapted to Manga   Blood Manipulation   Cute Protagonist   Demons   Dense Protagonist   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Humanoid Protagonist   Kind Love Interests   Lazy Protagonist   Loli   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male to Female   Monsters   Multiple POV   Overpowered Protagonist   Pacifist Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnated in Another World   Sleeping   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Vampires
author: Chokingyomaru   ちょきんぎょ。
description:
A polite and lethargic boy was reincarnated in another world as a vampire bishoujo.

In this world of swords and magic, this protagonist who was reborn replete with all kinds of cheat powers was searching for one thing――!

“Three meals a day, snacks and an afternoon nap, I guess.”

Are you really the protagonist!

And thus begins the fantasy comedy of a vampire looking for the ideal moocher lifestyle…?>
